Within a mutate() I can call map2.
```{r eval=FALSE}
ds_mtcars %<>% 
  mutate(pred = map2(grid, model, add_predictions))
```

BUt not outside of mutate()
```{r eval=FALSE}
map2(ds_mtcars$file_names, ds_mtcars$plots, ggsave)

ds_mtcars %>% 
  map2(file_names, plots, ggsave)
```
